Posts.Content: Hi I haven’t got a diagnosis as yet but I’m really frightened and have been reading your threads and have got a lot of comfort from your support to each other. I’ve got a problem I’m hoping someone will be able to give me some answers to . I hope this is ok ? I had a core biopsy on the 12/12/17 and am waiting for results but I have been told it’s suspicious and there waiting for all results before telling me more . I have never had a lump but puckering . An area was seen on ultrasound and so the core biopsy . I’ve bruised really badly and am black and blue and there is a hard lump under the bruise and it’s stinging . Is this normal ? I’ve also got a small yellow bruise on the side of the same breast and I think this is from the ladies thumb but this is hard too  . Is this normal? X.
Posts.Title: Hard stinging lump

Posts.Content: Than you x  my imagination gets the better of me and my mind and common sense go xx
Posts.Title: Hard stinging lump

Posts.Content: That’s just the best news ever abigail1607 , Bl**dy fantastic. Such a relief for you , how truly lovely to hear . Be happy . Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: Cancer free

Posts.Content: Hi Jayg. I have just finished my radiotherapy and same as you , 15#. You  could start moisturising now with Aveeno . If your on the bigger breasted size pay particular attention to under your breast . Ditch the bra during treatment if you can. Well placed scarfs disguise a natural boob shape and movement, and use a clean soft cotton hankie just under your breast to stop skin to skin . All the very best sweetheart, it will be over quickly . Oh and keep the water intake up . Lots of love and luck , Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi , I’ve finished day 10 of 15. I’ve found if I come home and get into bed and snooze for an hour or so I’m fine . If I don’t andcarry on with a normal day I’m reduced to tears with tiredness by late afternoon. Even if you get into bed and read etc your testing . Good luck . Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi Queenfisher. I’ve got 4 more zaps left . I went back to work after surgery and expected to work through radiotherapy but the travelling is exhausting and they do keep changing times so it’s really difficult to plan . Wearing a bra for me has become uncomfortable so Rather than scare the natives I’ve taken 2 weeks off plus I’ve been told to expect a flare up of my skin around day 10 after treatment so I’ve taken that off too but plan to go back without phased return . I’m a nurse so have quite a physical job . Xx I think you’ve just got to see how you go as everyone is unique xx good luck . Your nearly there XX Twinkle51
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi Queenfisher . Yes I took and used all the big hankies... very useful. Yes I’ve been using R1 and R2 . I used Aveeno before starting Radiotherapy so as to start with well moisturised skin . I’ve found I need to use 2   sachets of R1 to cover a good area , especially under your breast where you are more likely to get problems . I use 3 sachets of R2 and really slap it on thick and as often as I can . I’m braless at home but still put a clean hankie under my breast to protect from skin in skin friction of any kind and so far so good . 3 zaps to go xxxxx Twinkle51
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Happy Birthday Pam . Hope your zap today was quick and you were in and out so you could get on with your happy day . I’ve done day 13 today so 2 zaps left . It’s gone quickly . I’ve got dressings incase my skin breaks which I’ve been warned it can do up to 14 days post last zap . I’ve got big boobs and am braless as much as possible. Husband is finding it funny , children are horrified !! Slapping on the cream as much as possible. Keep going girls , we’re nearly there . Twinkle51 xxxxxxx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi Wueenfisher , yes I was very pink after day 1 but opposite side to where the original problem was . It also went on to become quite hot to the touch . I was given antibiotics but tbh it never changed and I’m now 6 days after finishing #15 and it is now only beginning to fade . Ask them to review it daily for you . Good luck xx Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi Mumof3plusoh, all your feelings are very very normal . Anyone talking to me at that stage would have thought I was just popping out for a coffee . I was very positive to the world . When asked I would reply “ oh yes I’m very lucky and absolutely fine . “. When I finished my radiotherapy which is now 16 days ago , I felt very strange . I was beside my self and felt all my emotions had been thrown in the air and I couldn’t feel normal or think straight. My Oncologist did say to me that all that had happened would hit me at some time and it did on my last day after treatment and all at once . I was completely disoriented and very tearful and I felt guilty because I have been lucky in a very unlucky situation. I say I’m a lucky unlucky  one . I thought I should just be able to take a deep breath , pat myself on the back and carry on as if nothing had happened. How wrong was I . But 16 days later I’m so much better . I cry at adverts and sob through the whole of Britain‘s got Talent , but I’m giving myself permission to just feel .. It’s as though going through treatment I was in a bit of a daze and then suddenly I was aware of everything I’d been through physically and emotionally. just let yourself be love . You’ve done the physical treatment now you have to do the mind and soul treatment. You’ll get there and it won’t take too long . I’m giving you a big hug and a gentle but well deserved pat on the back .  Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi . Last zap completed today. That’s me done !!!! Just need to see how the side effects go over the next few weeks . Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi jacks77 , I used 2 of the R1 as soon as I got home and then did the R2 bit . I layered it on and it soaked in really quickly xx good luck xx Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: It’s so weird isn’t Ginacarla. I finished Friday . All the tests,  the waiting , the results the further tests then more results the waiting for the plan .. and now done . No medal or banner or full gun salute as you leave . I was in shock and metaphorically looked over my shoulder and said “ what on earth happened to me . “ “ what has just happened “ xx Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Isn’t it a sad case of affairs when patients are treated so differently around our country. Everyone should be treated equally and have access to the best . I was lucky my GP didn’t bat an eyelid when prescribing R1 and R2 . But to hear some ladies are told no and others are routinely prescribed it as standard makes my nurses heart very very sad . Xx Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi PennyL, I was exactly the same as you and felt just as strange after treatment finished . It was like I couldn’t believe what had happened. I was fidgety, tearful and a rollercoaster of emotions and not very positive ones . That made me feel guilty as I know how many ladies and gents would be releaved to be in my shoes . The wonderful people on here reassured me these reactions were completely normal and we need to give ourselves time to catch up almost and then time to find our new peace .  Very well done for taking time to do this . Good luck lovely and be healthy and happy in mind , body and spirit , Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Jo Dec . Hi Jo , me too . Finished Friday and skipped out thinking lucky me but I have an area under my breast that is purple now . Really sore . Applying R2 then putting a dressing on it to stop skin rubbing on skin . Is it up to 2 weeks after RT you can expect problems? Twinkle51 x
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Mazda 10 . I wish you lived close by because if you did I get in my car and spend the evening with you . Firstly I’m so angry on your behalf . Shame on your family for treating you this way . However I’ve had similar conversations with my sisters so I truly feel your complete frustration. You know the truth sod them and stick with your friends and leave them to it . I’m pretty sure they’ll be asking you for a favour soon . Say no and don’t give a reason . As for your decision regarding the medication.. if your happy with your decision and we all know we don’t make them lightly , then bloody good for you . Xxx sending you lots of love xx Maria
Posts.Title: Bit Scared and a Lot Angry

Posts.Content: Gosh WhatHappened, our siblings sound so similar. I didn’t hear from mine over xmas and the NewYear because they didn’t want what was happening to me to spoil their celebrations. I had to go to my sisters to pick up some bits for my Mum and there were bottles of champagne by her bins . I was so chocked because it had been an effort for me just to get up and exist and not let my children see or guess how I was feeling . When I went to see a friend for the day my mobile never stopped with instructions from my sister on what needed doing for my Mum . I turned my phone off and when I turned it on a few hours later she’d got herself so worked up .... she had to do the things herself .... shock , horror . BUT to both you and Mazza 10, what I think is that I would never behave this way , I try my best to be kind and considerate whatever I’m going through. If our family can’t and are so selfish then shame on them and it’s their problem not ours . Carry on being good people but as someone mentioned , maintain a dignified silence and distance . I’m never rude to them , just to the point and quick . Done and dusted . Xxx lots of love AND SUPPORT to you both . Xx Maria
Posts.Title: Bit Scared and a Lot Angry

Posts.Content: Hello brave lady .. how did today go . I’ve been thinking about you all day so hope you got the good vibes I’ve sent ? Maria xx
Posts.Title: Bit Scared and a Lot Angry

Posts.Content: Hi . I’ve been walking this evening with husband and dog . 45 minutes and strangely enough I felt more comfortable it was dark with street lights only . Didn’t have to smile or make any conversation . I’m normally sociable but tonight not . I’ve enjoyed the peace and ...... I was happy!!! Today I’ve felt forgotten by many friends and family but the walk and the knowledge that my new friends  are out there and walking made me feel part of a very special group . Thank you xxx Maria xx
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: Hi . I walked to the vets and then to the shops . Did lots of noseying in gardens and peoples front rooms . I was joking to take pictures but then thought I might get arrested as a peeping tom !  Maria x
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: Just to let you all know I’ve been walking every day . Just around the block with my dog . Unable to take pictures as my dog tends to pull so I’ve needed both hands as training him on a new harness . I have to be honest and say when outside I find my brain relaxes . My concentration is on getting my dog to behave and looking at gardens and for that time it’s not on me . Loving it . And the fact that I know we are all doing it makes me feel part of a group of friends. Maria xx
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: Hi . Went out at 11.30 this morning and back at 2 this afternoon. Had a peaceful time . Maria xx will get pictures tomorrow xx
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: Gosh you are soo right . I never thought of this . I’ve had to call and make a real nuisance of myself to get appointments results etc . Nobody likes to do this and it makes me really really uncomfortable as being a nurse myself I don’t want to be labelled “she’s a nurse and bloody difficult with it “ . Funny thing is I keep apologising but quickly followed by “ I don’t think I’m going to change and be able to do this differently so I’ll apologise in advance asi know I’m goinv to be a thorn in your side “ Maria xx
Posts.Title: Advice needed please!!

Posts.Content: Hi . I had exactly the same thing . My operation was on the 24/1/18 but my appointment for results was 19/2/18 . My Consultant was on annual leave for a week also . It was rubbish and I was in bits .  The worst thing was there was nothing I could do to change it .... I’d tried to do that during a call I made to my BCN .  All I could do was vent my feelings and worries on this site .  Thinking of you and really feel for you  Xx Maria xx
Posts.Title: Results day tomorrow - both hopeful and terrifirf

Posts.Content: Toxophilite, Karen  , take care and drive safely. Count yourself as well and truly hugged also . Xx
Posts.Title: GREAT TIMING......

Posts.Content: Toxophilite, Karen  , take care and drive safely. Count yourself as well and truly hugged also . Xx
Posts.Title: GREAT TIMING......

Posts.Content: Thank you Jaz. On a site where I have  found so much support it was just awful to check in again after quite some time and see such upsetting accusations   . It left me feeling so very unsettled .  These situations need reporting and looking into so we can again gain positive strength .
Posts.Title: GREAT TIMING......

Posts.Content: Mazza10, lovely news . It gives me hope xx Maria xx
Posts.Title: Happy News .. for a change

Posts.Content: Hello my lovelies  well what a month I’ve had  . My mum broke her hip in 4 places on New Year’s Eve. Breaking my heart to see her so frail . I feel so useless. ive had a horrible infection which gave me labarythitis .. cough cough cough and I couldn’t walk straight and my husband fell at home and knocked himself out. Spent a few nights in hospital. My first mammogram and all clear ....started my new job . ... and it’s not even February. I hope all my friends are well and fighting the good fight . I may not comment much but I think about you all often . You are all just amazing xxxx
Posts.Title: My month!

Posts.Content: My fault. Bleeping useless I am . Sorry all for the confusion xx Twinkle51
Posts.Title: My month!

Posts.Content: Listen lovely , you’ve done the right thing . You’ve found something wrong and your dealing with it . I’m still being diagnosed but I’ve been told it’s cancer . Whatever it is you can deal with it . Everybody on this site is so supportive and they have encountered all scenarios . You will be fine whatever . Keep me informed . I truly know your pain but you are never alone I promise .  I’m giving you a big hug xxxxxx .
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry

Posts.Content: Hello everyone. My name is Maria . I have been diagnosed with Grade 1 Invasive Lobular Breast Cancer in my right breast . Lymph nodes clear. HER2 negative and ER 8/8 and PR 6/8. Lumpectomy in January and due to see oncologist on Thursday afternoon for medication and radiotherapy planning.  Any advice is very welcome .  Creams ... some one has mentioned R1 and R 2 but I’ve no idea how to get these .  I don’t have a shower and only bath .. I think that might be a small issue . I have no idea if the do’s and don’ts .  Any help grateful accepted.  This forum has supported me through some very difficult times and I would not have coped without it . Thank you all xx  Maria aka Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Ooh . My kind of present . How lovely .xx
Posts.Title: Just need a rant

Posts.Content: Leolady56 , good luck , I’ll be thinking of you lovely. Xx Twinkle51
Posts.Title: starting herceptin

Posts.Content: I didn’t mean to upset anyone I really didn’t . I think coming on this site is a choice but the advert that night was a shock and it wasn’t just once as I say . I turned over channels but still it was there and I could see my family’s distress. Raising money is so important for all of us and people like us in the future so fo me I choose skipping through the adverts as compulsory and necessary to keep my resolve and spirits up so I can remain as strong as I can muster xx
Posts.Title: Advert

Posts.Content: Good idea x
Posts.Title: Advert

Posts.Content: It’s New Years Eve and for the last few hours I’ve seen an advert with a young wome with breast cancer and then I find out she dies . This advert has been on now 5 times . Am I just being over sensitive . I’m astounded by the insensitivity . X
Posts.Title: Advert

Posts.Content: Hello . I’m so glad Life is better after awhile . I was wondering how I could live with this awful weight on my shoulders . Any tips on how you’ve managed this will be greatfully accepted .  I know the advert is so important to raise money  but when I saw my family’s heads drop after about the 3rd time I got really upset for all of us .  I want to live my life with as less of a shadow of this as I can muster but it’s proving easier said then done . That’s why I’m inspired by you , so thank you xx
Posts.Title: Advert

Posts.Content: Oh my love . I’m crying for you . This is desperately sad . Let your family and nurses look after you . Loosing a parent is just awful and you can’t escape the heart ache it brings . I’m so so sorry and wish I could give you a real hug and a real shoulder to cry and lean on . Twinkle51 xxxx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: LeoLady56 , I wish you the very best with your chemo. . As my nanny used to say “ Soonest done , soonest mended.” She was from Yorkshire and yes she often changed the words to suit...  but she was right . Take it one step at a time lovely . You have your friends galloping behind you and we’ll help you in every way we can . You have been such a help to me  and I’ll keep you in my thoughts . Xxx Twinkle51 xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***
